mapper.select: select t.GROUP_ID ,t.GROUP_NAME ,t.GROUP_TYPE ,t.TRADE_NAME ,t.STATUS ,t.MENO ,t.SOURCE_FROM ,t.CREATE_DATE ,t.CREATE_STAFF ,t.UPDATE_DATE ,t.UPDATE_STAFF from mem_member_group a, mem_group t where a.GROUP_ID = t.GROUP_ID and a.MEM_ID = #{req.memId } and a.STATUS = '1'
select ,a.name from mem_member_group t,mem_member a where t.MEM_ID = a.MEMBER_ID and t.STATUS = '1' and t.GROUP_ID = #{req.groupId }
